overview: data.tron [WUXGA version] is an audiovisual installation in which every single pixel of a visual image is strictly calculated by a mathematical principle. These images are projected onto an immense screen reflected with a minimal yet intense soundtrack that produces a powerful and hypnotic effect on the visitor. The installation is an alternative entry point into the complexity of data and challenges our assumptions on what kind of visual vocabulary belongs to the world of art versus tech.
title: Data.tron [WUXGA]
